## HttpsServer class

HTTPS Server with enhanced SSL/TLS configuration management and graceful shutdown

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HttpsServer extends BaseServer<HttpsServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;HttpsServerOptions&gt;
